example.text: If Americans want to ensure that Social Security benefits will be available to future generations, they need to move on from Biden, Trump, and their bipartisan Do-Nothing plan. [[url]]
I have been working on a proposal to address the third rail of politics. We’ve engaged a double-digit bipartisan group of senators to have a thoughtful discussion on the future of Social Security.

Bill on the Hill: Season 1, Episode 1: Saving, Strengthening, and Securing Social Security. In 9 years, Social Security is going insolvent, and all current & future beneficiaries will face a 24% benefit cut. I hit the streets to present our “Big Idea” to fix it. Come along! [[url]]

Until last week, [[user]] refused to meet on the debt limit for 97 days. Now there are only 16 days left and he plans to leave the country tomorrow. The American people deserve better than Biden's total lack of presidential leadership.
If Americans want to ensure that Social Security benefits will be available to future generations, they need to move on from Biden, Trump, and their bipartisan Do-Nothing plan. [[url]]

The presence of [[user]] [[user]] [[user]] [[user]] [[user]] [[user]] [[user]] [[user]] at today's Finance hearing on Latin America shows the importance of our Americas Act to the Western Hemisphere. Thank you for your support & partnership. [[url]]
Supporting American workers means supporting their jobs now and supporting their retirement savings. I urge him to sign this bill.
